attributes.action: Let Us Have Our Shareholder Vote - AS IS OUR LEGAL ENTITLEMENT
attributes.additional_details: RBS has continued to post incredible losses and is forecast to continue to do so.  Our government has failed dismally in controlling those losses and is depriving the shareholders (the taxpayers of this country) their legal entitlement to have a vote on the activities of a company in which they have invested and hold shares.  THE GOVERNMENT MUST repeat MUST NOW GIVE TAXPAYERS WHO ARE SHAREHOLDERS THE OPPORTUNITY TO VOTE ON WHETHER THEIR TAXPAYER POUNDS SHOULD BE ALLOWED TO BE SIPHONED AWAY BY FAILURES IN RBS MANAGEMENT AND LACK OF PROPER GUIDANCE FROM THEM
